title: Same War, Different Message: Trump Tonight vs. Biden Four Years Ago
summary_full: President Trump issued no statement in support of Ukraine on the anniversary of the Russian invasion, four years after his predecessor laid out the stakes.
summary_public: President Trump issued no statement in support of Ukraine on the anniversary of the Russian invasion, four years after his predecessor laid out the stakes.

UA.label: negative
UA.evidence: no statement in support of Ukraine
